message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it will bring to you, I'm confident that you'll find our price of $950000 quite reasonable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering market conditions and offers available, I would like to propose a price of $825000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the value of the product warranted a higher price. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to lower our initial asking price and offer the product to you for $875000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. To make this work for both of us, I would like to offer $850000 for the product.
